text: Loek Hollander (1938 - 16 February 2020) was a Dutch karate practitioner. He began training Kyokushin Karate in 1962.Shihan Loek Hollander Hollander earned his 1st dan ranking in 1965. Hollander was the fourth person ever to complete the 100-man kumite in 1967. He was one of the highest-ranking members of the IKO Kyokushinkaikan. Hollander was the International Committee Member for Europe and Africa. Hollander was born in Rotterdam and died in Rotterdam on 16 February 2020 at the age of 81.Karateka-legende Loek Hollander overleden ==References== ==Other websites== *Dutch Kyokushin Black Belt Register *Kyokushin in the Netherlands *40th WEST EUROPEAN SUMMER CAMP PAPENDAL 2007 *Loek Hollander's Hyakunin Kumite in Russian *Dutch Kyokushin in Dutch *Shihan Loek Hollander receiving the souvenir "Thank you for Kyokushin in Poland" *West European Summer Camp 2002 Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Rotterdam
title: Loek Hollander
